name: Telegram
description: A cross-platform cloud-based messaging service launched in 2013 by Pavel Durov. Telegram uses its proprietary MTProto protocol with server-client encryption for regular chats and optional end-to-end encryption for 'Secret Chats'. Client apps are open source, but server code is proprietary. As of 2024, Telegram has over 950 million monthly active users.
privacy_techniques: Anonymous accounts (phone number optional with Premium)
encryption_notes: E2E encryption only available in 'Secret Chats' feature, not enabled by default. Regular chats use server-client encryption only.
